articles.title: Law firms Allen & Overy and Shearman & Sterling plan merger - Reuters
articles.description: London-based law firm Allen & Overy and New York's Shearman & Sterling plan to merge, they announced on Sunday, in a deal that would create one of the world's largest legal practices with combined global revenue of approximately $3.4 billion.
